page.title: 18LOCAL DIALECT
page.content: Beadnell -Bead-lin,Oyster_catcher-Sea piet,Cormorant-Gormer.puffin- Tommy-Noddy,Guillemot-Wullymint, Mussel-Mushell,Limpet- Lempit, Sea-weed- Ware,Green crab -Dogger, Worm- Worrum, Turbot - Brat. Crab pot- Criev,High water-Hee witter Stern - Staring,Rudder -Ruther, Shoulder - Shoother,Shoot- Shut, Hooking - Yukking, Hooks -Yukks, Sick - Seek,Dig -Howk,Haul- Hal, Going home - Gan h'yem , At any rate -A tonnerit, Scissors -Thithers, Ladder -Lether, Northward -Norrit, Eastward -Easterd, Southward - Sutherd.
